name: sHexEx Classic Edition
description:
Default Controls
  • Arrows Keys - Move
  • X - Cancel 
  • Z - Confirm 
  • C - Menu (Middle) Button

No controller support, sorry. Please consider using JoytoKey.

Story

Your Grandma has bought you a new retro game mini console, but she bought you a bootleg version, oh no! Since you are bored, you might as well play each game.

Beat all 8 games to unlock the 9th game.

Created for the "Bootleg" Awfuljam, 2017

Help
  • You can exit any game with the Menu Button.
  • You can press the Menu Button on the game list to configure the game and see credits.
  • You can press F1 to reset controls to default.
Credits Game
  • Systemlogoff - You can also reach me via eMail.
Voices
  • Xibanya - From Team Dogpit Games
  • Mihai Zetta - From Team Dogpit Games
Music
  • Willfor - Who does his own projects as well.
